description: A meat processing plant has a machine that makes ham and bacon . Each kg of ham takes 15 minutes of machine time and each kg of bacon takes 8 minutes of machine time .   In a week the machine is only available for 2000 minutes . The plant can also make at most 200 kg of ham and at most 220 kg of bacon per week . If the profit per kg of ham is $ 20 and the profit per kg of bacon is $ 12 , how many of each should the plant make to maximize profit ?
